# Agentic AI Tools 2026 - Website Deployment

## Overview
This is a complete static website about Agentic AI Tools for 2026, with reviews, comparisons, and guides.

## Deployment Instructions

### Option 1: Deploy to Vercel (Recommended)

1. Install Vercel CLI:
```bash
npm install -g vercel
```

2. Deploy:
```bash
cd E:/trend-rush-skill
vercel --prod
```

3. Your site will be live at: `https://your-project.vercel.app`

### Option 2: Deploy to Netlify

1. Drag and drop the `dist` folder to Netlify
2. Or use Netlify CLI:
```bash
npm install -g netlify-cli
netlify deploy --prod --dir=dist
```

### Option 3: Deploy to GitHub Pages

1. Create a GitHub repository
2. Push the contents of `dist/` to the repository
3. Enable GitHub Pages in repository settings
4. Select source as `main` branch

## File Structure

```
dist/
├── index.html          # Main website
├── robots.txt          # SEO - Crawler instructions
├── sitemap.xml         # SEO - Site structure
└── README.md           # This file
```

## SEO Checklist

- [x] Meta title and description
- [x] Open Graph tags
- [x] Twitter Card tags
- [x] Structured data (JSON-LD)
- [x] Semantic HTML structure
- [x] Mobile-responsive design
- [x] Fast loading (static HTML)
- [x] robots.txt created
- [x] sitemap.xml created

## Next Steps

### 1. Monetization Setup

**Google AdSense:**
- Sign up at https://www.google.com/adsense
- Add ad units to the website
- Replace placeholder ad divs

**Affiliate Links:**
- Apply for affiliate programs (Anthropic, etc.)
- Replace tool links with affiliate URLs
- Add affiliate disclosure

**Email Marketing:**
- Set up ConvertKit/Mailchimp
- Integrate subscription form
- Create welcome email sequence

### 2. Analytics Setup

**Google Analytics 4:**
- Create GA4 property
- Add tracking code to website
- Set up conversion events

**Google Search Console:**
- Verify site ownership
- Submit sitemap.xml
- Monitor search performance

### 3. Search Engine Submission

1. **Google:** https://search.google.com/search-console
   - Add property
   - Verify ownership
   - Submit sitemap

2. **Bing:** https://www.bing.com/webmasters
   - Add site
   - Verify ownership
   - Submit sitemap

### 4. Promotion

- Share on social media (Twitter, LinkedIn, Reddit)
- Post in relevant communities
- Reach out to AI/tech bloggers
- Build backlinks

### Weekly Tasks

- Update tool reviews

- Major content refresh
- New tool additions
- SEO audit
- Performance optimization
